summary: Project aims to deploy an app to the Internet Computer (IC) for real-world use and needs guidance/assets adjustments (e.g., resizing visuals).
architectural_notes: Target deployment platform: Internet Computer (IC); deployment expected via dfx workflow (frontend/backend canisters).

existing_features.title: Increase the size of the selected header logo image at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1] to double its current rendered size by updating only that elementâ€™s sizing styles/classes (currently Tailwind className "h-8 w-8" in frontend/src/components/Header.tsx).

new_feature_requests.summary: Provide step-by-step deployment guidance for going live on the Internet Computer using dfx (frontend/backend/both).
Resize the selected image/visual asset to double its current size.
